about.summary: Provides a building block for optimization algorithms based on a simplex. The 'optimsimplex' package may be used in the following optimization methods: the simplex method of Spendley et al. (1962) <doi:10.1080/00401706.1962.10490033>, the method of  Nelder and Mead (1965) <doi:10.1093/comjnl/7.4.308>, Box's algorithm for constrained optimization (1965) <doi:10.1093/comjnl/8.1.42>, the  multi-dimensional search by Torczon (1989)  <http://www.cs.wm.edu/~va/research/thesis.pdf>, etc...

name: r-optimsimplex
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0-7' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-optimsimplex
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/optimsimplex_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/optimsimplex/optimsimplex_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1e3bdcac1f57410554fc74000f0521c5c0f05c41c07c2a63e5df94324610c3c5

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-optimbase >=1.0_8
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-optimbase >=1.0_8

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('optimsimplex')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('optimsimplex')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=optimsimplex
  license: CeCILL-2
  summary: 'Provides a building block for optimization algorithms based on a simplex. The ''optimsimplex''
    package may be used in the following optimization methods: the simplex method of
    Spendley et al. (1962) <doi:10.1080/00401706.1962.10490033>, the method of  Nelder
    and Mead (1965) <doi:10.1093/comjnl/7.4.308>, Box''s algorithm for constrained optimization
    (1965) <doi:10.1093/comjnl/8.1.42>, the  multi-dimensional search by Torczon (1989)  <http://www.cs.wm.edu/~va/research/thesis.pdf>,
    etc...'
  license_family: OTHER
  license_file: Licence_CeCILL_V2-en.txt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - xhochy

# Package: optimsimplex
# Type: Package
# Title: R Port of the 'Scilab' Optimsimplex Module
# Version: 1.0-7
# Date: 2018-02-12
# Author: Sebastien Bihorel, Michael Baudin (author of the original module)
# Maintainer: Sebastien Bihorel <sb.pmlab@gmail.com>
# Description: Provides a building block for optimization algorithms based on a simplex. The 'optimsimplex' package may be used in the following optimization methods: the simplex method of Spendley et al. (1962) <doi:10.1080/00401706.1962.10490033>, the method of  Nelder and Mead (1965) <doi:10.1093/comjnl/7.4.308>, Box's algorithm for constrained optimization (1965) <doi:10.1093/comjnl/8.1.42>, the  multi-dimensional search by Torczon (1989)  <http://www.cs.wm.edu/~va/research/thesis.pdf>, etc...
# Depends: optimbase (>= 1.0-8),methods
# License: CeCILL-2
# LazyLoad: yes
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-02-13 02:08:04 UTC; sebastien
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-02-13 22:00:40 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
